alert.note: Alert for Anne Arundel; Southeast Harford; Southern Baltimore (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 02 at 4:02PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...LOCALLY DENSE FOG ALONG WESTERN SHORE... Dense fog over the Chesapeake Bay is starting to move inland along the Western Shore, reducing visibility to one quarter of a mile or less. This is causing reduced visibility on Interstate 95, Interstate 695, Interstate 895, and US Highway 50. Expect additional fog to develop through the evening, with Dense Fog Advisories likely to be needed for tonight. Dense fog is hazardous if driving at high speeds. Be prepared for rapidly changing visibility. Slow down, increase following distance, and use low beam headlights when encountering dense fog.

area.areaDesc: Anne Arundel; Southeast Harford; Southern Baltimore
